item.title:
RT by @elsewheremarg8: We're at #MargateZineFair today @elsewheremarg8
Head on down to grab your copies of our #Zines, and have a chat with top gent >@WhiskyBeards while you're there! (Check out his awesome books too)
#WritingCommunity #Margate

item.title:
THE BETHS
Third LP 'Expert In A Dying Field' from the New Zealand quartet @THEBETHS houses 12 jewels of tight, guitar-heavy songs that worm their way into your head.
Pressed on canary yellow vinyl, pre order>>

item.title:
FRANC MOODY
New record from @FrancMoody 'Into The Ether', released 2nd September.
'Into The Ether' deals with the idea of reaching a promised land, leaving the wind and the rain to head off to sunnier climes and escape from the norm.
https://www.elsewhere.community/collections/pre-orders/products/franc-moody-into-the-ether #vinylrecords
item.dc:creator: @elsewheremarg8

item.dc:creator: @elsewheremarg8
item.description:
DROPKICK MURPHYS

@DropkickMurphys bring Woody Guthrie’s perennial jabs at life into the time of their lives, on 'This Machine Still Kills Fascists'. The resulting music is eerily relevant to today’s world.

On crystal vinyl, pre-order here>
elsewhere.community/collecti…
#vinylrecords

item.title:
RT by @elsewheremarg8: On 25th June at @Elsewheremarg8, more than 20 zinesters will be taking part in the all new Margate Zine Fair & there will be workshops, tarot readings, stick + poke tattoos and much more. Free entry 12-7pm, music 9pm til late.
Book tickets and info here: https://dice.fm/partner/elsewhere-uk/event/5yqyl-margate-zine-fair-2022-25th-jun-elsewhere-margate-margate-tickets
item.dc:creator: @margatemercury
item.description:
On 25th June at @Elsewheremarg8, more than 20 zinesters will be taking part in the all new Margate Zine Fair & there will be workshops, tarot readings, stick + poke tattoos and much more. Free entry 12-7pm, music 9pm til late.

Book tickets and info here:
dice.fm/partner/elsewhere-uk…

item.title:
MAKAYA MCCRAVEN
'In These Times' is a collection of polytemporal compositions inspired as much by broader cultural struggles as @MakayaMcCraven personal experience as a product of a multinational, working class musician community.
Pre-order here>> https://www.elsewhere.community/collections/pre-orders/products/makaya-mccraven-in-these-times
